executable.title: Fiber Bundle Label Select
executable.description: Fiber bundle label select allows a user to select tracts passing or not passing through single or multiple labels. (Selection region label maps may be created with the Editor module or other segmentation tools.)

image.name: InputLabel_A
image.label: Selection Region Label Map
image.description: Label map volume defining selection region

geometry.name: OutputFibers
geometry.label: Output Fiber Bundle
geometry.description: Selected tractography result from region-based selection.

integer-vector.name: PassLabel
integer-vector.label: Inclusion labels (comma-separated)
integer-vector.description: Comma-separated list of label values defining inclusion region. Fibers passing through these labels will be retained.

string-enumeration.name: PassOperation
string-enumeration.label: Inclusion label combination logic
string-enumeration.description:
AND: Fiber must pass through all specified labels.
OR: Fiber must pass through any specified label (at least one).

integer-vector.name: NotPassLabel
integer-vector.label: Exclusion labels (comma-separated)
integer-vector.description: Comma-separated list of label values defining exclusion region. Fibers passing through these labels will be removed.

string-enumeration.name: NoPassOperation
string-enumeration.label: Exclusion label combination logic
string-enumeration.description:
AND: Any fiber passing through all specified labels is excluded.
OR: Fibers passing through any specified label (at least one) are excluded.
